net.sf.mmm.util.contenttype.base.format

Class SegmentContainerRepeat

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.contenttype.base.format.Segment
      • net.sf.mmm.util.contenttype.base.format.SegmentContainer
        • net.sf.mmm.util.contenttype.base.format.SegmentContainerSequence
          • net.sf.mmm.util.contenttype.base.format.SegmentContainerRepeat

  • public class SegmentContainerRepeat
extends SegmentContainerSequence
    A SegmentContainerRepeat is a SegmentContainerSequence that can be repeated. The occurrences of the actual sequence is bound by getMinimumOccurrence() and getMaximumOccurrence().
    The following example shows a metadata definition of key/value pairs ("KEY=VALUE;") that are terminated by '\0'. There has to be at least 1 and at maximum 99 of such key/value pairs to match. 
     ...
 <repeat minOccure="1" maxOccure="99">
 <key>
 <constant ascii="="/>
 <value>
 <constant ascii=";"/>
 </repeat>
 <constant hex="00"/>
 ..
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • getMaximumLength

        public long getMaximumLength()
        Description copied from class: Segment
        This method gets the maximum length of this Segment. Simple Segments like SegmentConstant have a fixed length. In this case the result of this method is the same as Segment.getMinimumLength(). Otherwise, the Segment is variable and this method returns a value greater than Segment.getMinimumLength(). Use Long.MAX_VALUE for an unbound segment like SegmentAny.
        Overrides:
        getMaximumLength in class SegmentContainer
        Returns:
        the maximum length.

      • validateNonRecursive

        protected void validateNonRecursive(StringBuilder source)
        Description copied from class: Segment
        This method validates this segment to ensure the correctness of the configured format.
        ATTENTION:
        This method does NOT perform a recursive validation of potential sub-segments.
        Overrides:
        validateNonRecursive in class SegmentContainer
        Parameters:
        source - describes the source of the validation.
